actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to modify the plan for harbor improvement at Honolulu Harbor, Oahu, Hawaii.

summary.text: Modifies the harbor improvement project at Honolulu Harbor, Oahu, Hawaii, to delete the requirement for certain local cash contributions and to direct the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to dredge Kapalama Basin.

titles.title: A bill to modify the plan for harbor improvement at Honolulu Harbor, Oahu, Hawaii.
